cluster_information.name: Binding
cluster_information.description: A binding represents a persistent relationship between an endpoint and one or more other local or remote endpoints.

struct_fields.name: Node
struct_fields.description: This is the remote target node ID. If the Endpoint field is present, this field SHALL be present.

struct_fields.name: Group
struct_fields.description: This is the target group ID that represents remote endpoints. If the Endpoint field is present, this field SHALL NOT be present.

struct_fields.name: Endpoint
struct_fields.description: This is the remote endpoint that the local endpoint is bound to. If the Group field is present, this field SHALL NOT be present.

struct_fields.name: Cluster
struct_fields.description: This is the cluster ID (client & server) on the local and target endpoint(s).

attributes.name: Binding
attributes.description: Each entry SHALL represent a binding.
